bridge.toolkit.commands
Class ResourcesValidator

java.lang.Object
  bridge.toolkit.commands.ResourcesValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.commons.chain.Command
public class ResourcesValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.commons.chain.Command

Validates that all the DMs and LDMs in the manifest file plus the ICNs that are referenced in those files exist in the resource package.

Field Detail

foundResources

java.util.List<java.io.File> foundResources
List of the validated resources that are found in the resource package. Validated resources are referenced in the SCPM/Manifest file and also the exist in the resource package submitted to the toolkit.

findDM

public boolean findDM(java.util.List<java.lang.String> iDM,
                      java.io.File[] iResources)
Loops through the list of resource files in the resource package to see if the DMs found in the SCPM exists in the package.

Parameters:
iDM - List of all the DMs found in the SCPM that are now hrefs in file elements in resource elements in the manifest file.
iResources - Array of all the files found in the resource package.
Returns:
boolean that indicates if there were any referenced DMs that were not found in the resource package.
